name: MovieApp
description: A single-page application allowing users to browse top-rated films, search for films, and add films to a favorites list. Favorites are persisted using the browser's local storage. Built in order to gain some exposure to the Vue framework.

name: ES Apparel
description: A full-stack Ratings and Reviews microservice built out for an E-commerce application. Renders pertinent user-provided product information and allows users to submit reviews of their own. Overall contributes to a better E-commerce experience, allowing potential consumers to make more informed purchase decisions based upon first-hand, user-provided feedback and experience.

name: Choss Finder
description: A quick proof-of-concept application allowing users to access a curated list of top-rated rock climbs based on their current location.
